## Class `ReduceOp`

Indicates how a set of values should be reduced.



### Aliases:

* Class <a href="/api_docs/python/tf/distribute/ReduceOp"><code>tf.compat.v1.distribute.ReduceOp</code></a>
* Class <a href="/api_docs/python/tf/distribute/ReduceOp"><code>tf.compat.v2.distribute.ReduceOp</code></a>


<!-- Placeholder for "Used in" -->

* `SUM`: Add all the values.
* `MEAN`: Take the arithmetic mean ("average") of the values.

## Class Members

* `MEAN` <a id="MEAN"></a>
* `SUM` <a id="SUM"></a>
